name: khajyrim
short_description: A comprehensive Skyrim mod that will feature new quests, items, environments, NPCs, and interactions for The Elder Scrolls: Skyrim. Questline will center around the creation of a new settlement founded by Khajiit and welcoming all the underprivileged inhabitants of Skyrim.
summary: A Skyrim Mod featuring a Khajiit-centric storyline
